refnamediv.refpurpose: Add cover art to flac files.

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: The command dlac-add-picture takes a directory tree of flac files. It uses Music Brainz to identify Amazon part number(asin) of the album. The asin is used to try retrieve the album cover art for the album. Cover art and asin are stored in the flac file. If a flac file already has cover art stored, nothing will be done.
